response.question: Evaluate the submitted assignment/code strictly against the provided requirements/description.
response.feedback: Score: 1.0/1.0. Graded against Reference Key and Assignment Description. The submitted C code correctly implements the linear search algorithm. The logic, particularly the loop condition `for (i = 0; i < n; i++)`, is correct for iterating through an array of size 'n'. This logic matches the correct implementation provided in the C++ reference material (383220dc-961f-4173-8874-c60b05607fa0.docx). The code is syntactically correct and achieves the desired outcome.
